overview:
Mr. Krish A. Prabhu, Ph.D. has been Chief Executive Officer and President of AT&T Labs, Inc. since June 23, 2011.

Mr. Prabhu has valuable experience in research, corporate leadership, innovation and venture funding. He served as Interim Chief Executive Officer and President of Tekelec since January 5, 2011 and an Advisor of Navini since December 2000. Mr. Prabhu has a long and distinguished career in the global telecommunications industry and strong strategic planning skills. He is an Advisor to various companies in the telecommunications and semiconductor industries. He served as the Chief Executive Officer and President of Tellabs Inc., a Venture Partner of Morgenthaler Venture Partners, Mobility Ventures LLC, Chief Operating Officer of Alcatel Telecom and Executive Vice President.

Mr. Prabhu holds a Bachelor of Science degree in Physics from Bangalore University in India, and a Master of Science degree in Physics from the esteemed IIT in Mumbai, India. He also holds a Master of Science degree and a Ph D in Electrical Engineering from the University of Pittsburgh.
